channel.title: Whats with my server?!
channel.description:
well i made a server, i couldnt add global objects to it i realized after like 3 hours of coding. so i coded it some more and then got another source and then on that one i couldnt make safezones? wtf?
they're really easy things to do, just they dont work. when i try to make global objects, they dont appear. when i try to make safezones, it still says wild and i can attack other people. WHATS WRONG??!!! Please guys, i need your help!

item.title: Whats with my server?!
item.dc:creator: @lunden lunden
item.description:
@lunden wrote:

is it silab?, if
Then where is 4876, 3044 , Its only black there.

           makeGlobalObject(4876, 3044, 3491, 0, 10);//general stall

Try change the 4876, 3044 To something else.

Read full topic

idk whats wrong i did this on other sources with no problem…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2008, 09:31:08 am[/size][hr][quote=“xx twinz xx, post:2, topic:227824”]Well first of all, different servers have different methods lol.
You can’t just switch source and expect everything to be the same.

Also, with your global object sproblem, are you sure you are adding the method into the loading packet?

Ie. If your void for new objects were to be;

public void Newobjects() {
//NEW OBJECTS ADDED HERE
}

Then, you would add;

Newobjects();

Inside packet 121. (loading packet)

case 121:

Good luck.[/quote]

and yes, it already is in case 121.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats with my server?!
item.dc:creator: @xx_twinz_xx xx twinz xx
item.description:
@xx_twinz_xx wrote:

Well first of all, different servers have different methods lol.
You can’t just switch source and expect everything to be the same.

Also, with your global object sproblem, are you sure you are adding the method into the loading packet?

Ie. If your void for new objects were to be;

public void Newobjects() {
//NEW OBJECTS ADDED HERE
}

Then, you would add;

Newobjects();

Inside packet 121. (loading packet)

case 121:

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats with my server?!
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

well i made a server, i couldnt add global objects to it i realized after like 3 hours of coding.
so i coded it some more and then got another source and then on that one i couldnt make safezones?
wtf?

they’re really easy things to do, just they dont work.
when i try to make global objects, they dont appear.
when i try to make safezones, it still says wild and i can attack other people.
WHATS WRONG??!!!
Please guys, i need your help!

Read full topic
